text: Ke tapa'ile dekhnu bha'ena ki allaha badalaharula'i cala'umcha. Pheri uniharula'i paraspara mila'umcha ra pheri tyasala'i patrapatrama paridancha, pheri tapa'i dekhnuhuncha ki badalabata pani niski vrsti bha'irakheko cha, ra akasatirabata asinaka pahadabata usaile asinaharu khasalcha, ani jasamathi cahancha, tyasamathi khasalcha ra jasabata cahancha tyasala'i hata'idincha. Badalabatai niskane catyangako camaka yasto huncha ki amkhako jyoti nai khosidinecha
